name: Alameda County Social Services Agency VITA
description: Free tax preparation; help with EITC and CalEITC credits
fullDescription: Alameda County Social Services Agency offers free tax preparation through the IRS Volunteer Income Tax Assistance (VITA) program for low to moderate income residents.
whatTheyOffer:
- Free tax preparation for income up to $64,000
- Help claiming Earned Income Tax Credit (EITC)
- CalEITC (California Earned Income Tax Credit) assistance
- IRS-certified volunteer preparers
- E-filing available
howToGetIt:
1. Check the Alameda County website for VITA site locations
2. Make appointment through online scheduler (opens late January)
3. Gather required documents (W-2s, 1099s, ID, Social Security cards)
4. Attend your scheduled appointment
5. File your return
